section.title:
units of measure
master list of Units of Measure
section.para: Units of measure (UOM) represent the standard amount in which quantities of an item are managed (e.g., "EACH," "POUNDS," "GALLONS," etc.). To access the master list of UOM, select the Units of Measure option. The following screen will appear.
The Units of Measure screen displays information on all existing UOM, including UOM name and description.

note.para: Users may also enter free-form UOMs wherever UOM definitions are requiredâ€”for example, in the Item master. The ability to enter free-form UOMs provides flexibility so that all the UOMs your site requires do not need to be previously added to the UOM master list.
